Headline: #35 35th Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Pershing
ShortDescription: 35 35th buses are rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 31st, California, 36th Place, and resume normal route: due to police activity near Kedzie/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#35 35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, 31st, California, 36th Place, and resume normal route: due to police activity near Kedzie/Pershing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/85th
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 79th, Damen, 87th, Ashland, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Ashland/85th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 79th, Damen, 87th, Ashland, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Ashland/85th.
 
Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
